markdownRemark.html:
At first there was Poincare
He begat The Conjecture

Which grew into a dirty fight because of attempts to grab the fruits of The One’s labor.

On a more humorless note, I’m trying to follow James Tauber’s incredible blog, on a layman’s attempt to decipher the Poincare Conjecture.

Really, really interesting.
